resources.string: My job is to keep you updated with the latest Coding contests, Hackathons, events, Meet up, courses related to Computer science.
So, What do you want to look at first?
Kickstart July round is about to start..Let\'s prepare
Amid coronavirus pendamic IBM organises a real life problem solving competition
SAP comes again with its annual hackathon with new challenges and rewards
Dare2Complete Honda online Hackathon is live now
Microsoft is going to organise a live webinar on Azure very soon.
Google Devfest 2020 seems to be delayed because of coronavirus.
TCS continuously hosting webinars on technical topics to benifits students in this lockdown.
Infosys hiring process is going to start as InFYTQ result has been declared
Tech Giant Google have not stopped hiring amid COVID-19
IBM provided free access to its cloud service for 2 months
Professional cloud certifications exams are available for free till lockdown along with learning resources
The next InFYTQ winner seminar and hiring process is supposed to be begin in the month of September
The new Egnite chapter of Dare2Complete is here and forms are avialable till June 2020
Campus Ambassdor program of GfG is going to end soon
The winner of Honda Hackathon will be invited at its Mumbai main office
"Codechef launches weekly DSA practice challenges to engage students during lockdown "
"New coding challenges for daily practice launched by Hackerearth "
Companies specific coding questions are made available for free by GfG
Honda is coming up with exiting new challenges and rewards soon
Google launches 1 month learning program on Kotlin for Android Development
Nasscom releases foundation AI course on Skill UP website for free amid lockdown
GfG made its Amazon SDE test series free for limited time
Indian Technical Education board AICTE collaborated with many online learning platforms to offer variety of free courses amid lockdown
